name: Basic Sokkie Step
description: Step side-to-side with a lively rhythm, perfect for SA social events.
tips: Relax your hips and follow the beat!

name: Cuddle Position Turn
description: Leader guides the follower into a wrapped 'cuddle' position before unwinding back to open position.
tips: Maintain gentle frame and donâ€™t over-rotate the wrap; keep it relaxed and controlled.

name: Basic TwoStep
description: Quick-quick-slow-slow pattern, common in South African line dances.
tips: Keep steps small in crowded venues.
